00034 
00035 class SoSensor;
00036 class SoFieldSensor;
00037 class SoGlyph;
00038 
00039 class COIN_DLL_API SoText3 : public SoShape {
00040   typedef SoShape inherited;
00041 
00042   SO_NODE_HEADER(SoText3);
00043 
00044 public:
00045   static void initClass(void);
00046   SoText3(void);
00047 
00048   enum Part {
00049     FRONT = 1,
00050     SIDES = 2,
00051     BACK =  4,
00052     ALL = FRONT|BACK|SIDES
00053   };
00054 
00055   enum Justification {
00056     LEFT = 1,
00057     RIGHT,
00058     CENTER
00059   };
00060 
00061   SoMFString string;
00062   SoSFFloat spacing;
00063   SoSFEnum justification;
00064   SoSFBitMask parts;
00065 
00066   SbBox3f getCharacterBounds(SoState * state, int stringindex, int charindex);
00067 
00068   virtual void GLRender(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00069   virtual void getPrimitiveCount(SoGetPrimitiveCountAction * action);
00070 
00071 protected:
00072   virtual ~SoText3();
00073 
00074   virtual void generatePrimitives(SoAction *);
00075   virtual void computeBBox(SoAction * action, SbBox3f & box, SbVec3f & center);
00076   virtual SoDetail * createTriangleDetail(SoRayPickAction * action,
00077                                          const SoPrimitiveVertex * v1,
00078                                          const SoPrimitiveVertex * v2,
00079                                          const SoPrimitiveVertex * v3,
00080                                          SoPickedPoint * pp);
00081 
00082   virtual void notify(SoNotList *list);
00083   
00084 private:
00085   class SoText3P * pimpl;
00086   friend class SoText3P;
00087   void render(SoState * state, unsigned int part);
00088   void generate(SoAction * action, unsigned int part);
00089 };
